title: Google Fi gets a new name, tweaked pricing, and a new focus on family plans
description: There's no shortage of changes coming to Google's wireless carrier.

title: Reddit will start charging some users for API access -- bad news for AI companies
description: After being used by multiple AI companies to train their AI systems for free, Reddit is ready to cash in.

title: Is your iPhone overheating and crashing since installing iOS 16.4.1? Here's what to do
description: Here are a few things you can do to minimize the iOS battery drama while we wait for the update to the update.

title: How to kill a process in Linux
description: Sometimes a process or application can cause problems on a Linux machine. When that happens, you'll need to know how to kill the wayward process.

title: Netflix to charge for password sharing in the U.S. as soon as this summer
description: The decision comes after the company tested out password-sharing fees in Canada and three other countries worldwide.

title: Want a Flipper Zero without paying inflated prices? Now's your chance
description: The Flipper Zero is a powerful, multi-functional, cybersecurity tool, and you can now pick one up for less than usual.

title: This $30 USB hub finally ended my MacBook port struggle
description: The Plugable 5-in-1 adapter gives the latest MacBooks extra ports without blocking the one that matters the most.

title: The Kubuntu Focus Ir14 is an upcoming Linux laptop worthy of powering the KDE Plasma desktop
description: The latest Kabuntu laptop marries security-first hardware with its Linux-based operating system. Here are three features in particular that stand out.

title: If you have a tell-a-friend feature on your website, disable it right now
description: Despite all the best efforts, bad things can happen. Read our cautionary tale.

title: Galaxy Watch 5 finally gets temperature-based cycle tracking update
description: Samsung enabled skin temperature tracking on its Watch 5 series. Here's what you need to know.

title: Your HomePod can now alert you if you're smoke alarm is going off
description: Apple HomeKit users just got a new Sound Recognition feature to make their smart homes safer. Here's how to enable it.

title: Millions of Facebook users are entitled to a settlement payout. How to file a claim
description: Meta settled its lawsuit that alleged the company allowed a political marketing firm to improperly access user data. You might be owed some money.

title: You'll never guess how many tech repair tools this little bag can fit
description: The iFixit Repair Business Toolkit just got a 2023 refresh. Here's everything included.

title: This AI-powered app lets you chat with historical and fictional characters
description: With this new chat app, you can talk to AI versions of Leonardo DaVinci, Shakespeare, Hercules, Dracula, and many other famous and infamous characters.

title: The best Mother's Day gifts for 2023
description: Stuck on what to get your mother, caregiver, or mother figure? I compiled a list of various tech gadgets I know my mom is sure to love  (and actually use) to give you some inspiration.

title: How to enable markdown in Google Docs (and what it can do for you)
description: Looking for a way to use Google Docs even more efficiently? This can help.

title: China wants to use supercomputing to accelerate digital transformation
description: China's national supercomputing framework will pull together computing resources across the country to drive the development of emerging technologies, such as artificial intelligence.

title: These medical IoT devices carry biggest security risks
description: Unpatched and running on operating systems that are no longer supported, these connected healthcare devices carry significant security risks for a sector that's already a top target for cyber criminals.
